question: Which among the following is the most correct feature of an Internationalized domain name (IDN) ?
option1: The IDN has an extension which refers to the country specific domain such as .br for Brazil and .cn for China
option2: The IDN has at least a single label which is language specific such as Chinese or Hindi.
option3: The IDN Domain Registries are not accredited by ICANN ( Internet Corporation for Assigned Names and Numbers) but the independent registries in some countries.
option4: The IDN is out of the rules and procedures of the Domain Name System (DNS).
answer: The IDN has at least a single label which is language specific such as Chinese or Hindi.
